info.name: painted black - phpinfo
info.description:
phpinfo()


version 0.0.1


--[description]

As a userstyle, for dealing with ones which aren't your own script.  If it's your phpinfo script, you should probably just follow the URL below, and use that to see how to exclude default CSS, and paste this in its place.

http://us3.php.net/manual/en/function.phpinfo.php#77705

Of course, I intentionally blanked the class="v" text for the screenshots.


--[relevant]

See also:
http://userstyles.org/styles/search/painted+black
